resources.string: In this android application, you will learn about basic knowledge of fluid mechanics, not only text content , also formula for fluid mechanics calculation. We will also include explanation of the formula for easy understanding.
This is an app mainly focus on the fluid mechanics basic knowledge.
Here you can see me when you scroll down!

Fluids flow under the action of such forces, deforming continuously for as long as the force is applied. A fluid is unable to retain any unsupported shape; it flows under its own weight and takes the shape of any solid body with which it comes into contact.
In most cases, substances can be classified easily as either solids or fluids. However, certain cases appear to be solids because their rate of deformation under their own weight is very small.
